source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn is the very picture of determination.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_00<tab>Варшанн всем своим видом демонстрирует готовность действовать.

source:
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_01<tab>Varshahn stands ready to sally forth into the moon's dark depths, there to confront Zeromus and rescue his sister Azdaja. Though the stakes are high, he vows to keep his emotions in check and let nothing sway him from his chosen course─and by the set of his jaw, you do not doubt that he will be true to his word.

※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_02<tab>As you advance through the red moon's subterranean maze, you happen upon a memoria crystal. No sooner does it begin to glow than you find yourself reliving a memory of bygone days, in which a man named Durante fights to protect king and country alongside his companion Golbez. The pair are in pursuit of a dark memoriate, whom they finally confront in the heart of a castle. The malign warrior appears defeated, but with his final breath corrupts Golbez with the power of a dark memoria crystal, leaving Durante with no choice but to lay his friend low and seal him in memoria. Though heartbroken, he is not deterred from his mission, and proclaims that Golbez will live on as the hero who saves the world.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_03<tab>The memory has laid bare the shocking truth: the man you believed to be Golbez is in fact his companion Durante. The impostor emerges from the shadows to stand before you, and Zero urges him to abandon his desperate cause, but the man who was Durante remains adamant that terrible might wielded for tremendous change is the only answer. He reveals that, in his bid to end the Contramemoria, it was none other than he who unleashed the Flood of Darkness and doomed the Thirteenth. Having reaffirmed his purpose and his name, Golbez then takes his leave to ensure that nothing interferes with Zeromus's awakening.

※In the event that you leave the darkened vestibule, you may return via the red moon.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_04<tab>In spite of everything you have heard from Golbez, Zero clings to the hope that he may yet see reason. Together you venture deeper into the moon's subterrane in search of the man, determined to put an end to his dark plot once and for all.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_05<tab>At last you corner Golbez in his domain─only to discover it is a ploy. Your foe conjures shades of his fallen archfiends, together with whom he attempts to bar the path to Zeromus, but your comrades manage to occupy them long enough to afford you an opening to slip past. So it is that you arrive in the nexus where the dread voidsent slumbers. It stirs to life in your presence, and it falls to you to prevent it from destroying the barrier between worlds.

※The Abyssal Fracture can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_06<tab>A harrowing battle ensues in which the very fabric of reality begins to fray. Yet for all its strength, Zeromus falters. You deliver the decisive strike, causing Golbez's champion to dissipate. Alas, the air remains thick with despair...

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_07<tab>As was feared, Zeromus coalesces from the aether as many times as it is struck down. But joined by your comrades─a repentant Golbez among them─you succeed not only in sealing the being in memoria, but rescuing Azdaja besides. Thus is the day won, and after millennia, Vrtra reunited with his beloved sister.

TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SEQ_08<tab>Though your meeting with Zero was mere happenstance, from it grew a friendship that gave the memoriate a new beginning. Together with Golbez, she is confident that the void can be restored. And should they want for aid, they now know where to find it.

target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_00<tab>Войдите в миссию «Лунные подземелья».
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_01<tab>Зачистите лунные подземелья.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_02<tab>Поговорите с Зеро.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_03<tab>Поговорите с Зеро.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_04<tab>Confront Zeromus in the Abyssal Fracture.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_04<tab>Бросьте вызов Зеромусу в испытании «Темница мрака».

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_05<tab>Confront Zeromus in the Abyssal Fracture.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_05<tab>Бросьте вызов Зеромусу в испытании «Темница мрака».
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_TODO_06<tab>Поговорите с Зеро.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Glad though I am that the plan worked, we are in no position to celebrate. The day is not won yet!
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Я рада, что план сработал, но праздновать пока рано. Битва выиграна, но не война!

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>She's no longer the cold, distant soul we met in the void. Or perhaps, until now, she just never had a chance to be who she truly is.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>Она больше не холодная, потерянная душа, каковой мы вытащили её из Бездны. Возможно, до этого самого момента она не знала, кто она такая на самом деле.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_010<tab>This radiance is just the beginning. We must see it cast into the deepest depths of the moon.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_010<tab>Это только начало. Нужно придумать, как направить этот свет в тёмные глубины луны.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_015<tab>My dragon form shall remain here to secure our escape route. The voidsent who dare to approach the gate will reckon with me.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_015<tab>Моё драконье тело останется здесь на случай поспешного отступления. Демонам, которые захотят приблизиться к вратам, лучше подумать дважды.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Отправиться на красную луну?

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_020<tab>Rest assured I will not let my emotions overwhelm me. When the moment comes, I will call to my sister, and I will wrest her free from Zeromus.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_020<tab>Не переживайте, я не собираюсь давать волю эмоциям. Когда придёт время, я потянусь к своей сестре, и надеюсь, это поможет ей вырваться из хватки Зеромуса.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_021<tab>The crater awaits. Woe betide any who bar our path.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_021<tab>Кратер ждёт. Горе тем, кто заступит нам дорогу.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_Q1_000_000<tab>Что вы хотите сделать?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_001<tab>Поговорить.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Lunar Subterrane.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_002<tab>Сформировать группу для похода в лунные подземелья.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_A1_000_003<tab>Ничего.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>The lingering Light illuminates the way to our foe. It will not escape us.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>Остатки Света указывают нам путь к врагу. Он не сбежит.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_035<tab>We've no time to waste. The voidsent we felled will return ere long.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_035<tab>Нельзя терять времени. Не хватало, чтобы сюда слетелось ещё больше демонов.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_040<tab>“Take heart, and protect them well”... I will live up to my own words. This I swear.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_040<tab>«Скрепи сердце, и защищай их как следует...» Мои собственные слова. Клянусь.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_045<tab>When we find Golbez, let me speak with him─please. There is something I must know.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_045<tab>Когда отыщем Голбеза, дайте мне поговорить с ним, прошу. Мне нужно кое-что знать.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>To yearn to save the world, only to bring about its unmaking... 'Tis a tragic tale. But it changes nothing.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>В желании спасти мир он обрёк его... печальная история. Но это ничего не меняет.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_305<tab>We rarely believe ourselves the villain. But if our ends demand unconscionable sacrifice, what else can we be?
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_305<tab>Вдруг и мы злодеи? Если наш путь требует бесконечных жертв, чем ещё мы можем быть?..

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_310<tab>He speaks of salvation─of fulfilling an honored friend's legacy. Yet he does not scruple to discard others for his ambitions...
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VARSHAHN_000_310<tab>Так он говорит о спасении или воплощении в жизнь надежд старого друга? И почему готов принести в жертву других ради этих амбиций?..
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_400<tab>Поторопимся.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_405<tab>In the darkest recesses of the moon await Golbez and Zeromus. They are resolved to save their world...and condemn yours.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_405<tab>В самых мрачных глубинах луны вас ждут Голбез и Зеромус. Они решительно настроены спасти свой мир... и обречь ваш.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_406<tab>Are you prepared to brave the dark?
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_406<tab>Готовы бросить вызов тьме?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Перейти в мрачный вестибюль?
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Перейти в Темницу мрака?

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_600<tab>That Azdaja lives is a miracle made possible by the unique nature of the void...
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_600<tab>Аждайя выжила - это чудо, которому мы обязаны уникальным свойствам этого мира.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_601<tab>...Ah, yes. The aether transmitters, I shall leave with Zero. They will be of more use in the Thirteenth than in the Source.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_YSHTOLA_000_601<tab>...А, да. Эфирные передатчики оставлю Зеро. Смею заметить, на Тринадцатом они пригодятся куда больше.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_605<tab>I've already seen Varshahn safely to Vrtra. Many would be heartbroken if their “little brother” failed to return home.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_ESTINIEN_000_605<tab>Мы уже вернули Варшанна к Вритре. Многие расстроятся, если их "младший братишка" не вернётся домой.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_610<tab>Never again shall we be parted, Sister. Never again.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_VRITRA_000_610<tab>Мы никогда больше не расстанемся, сестра. Никогда.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_700<tab>Never did I imagine that the Light I bore could bring about such change.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_700<tab>Никогда бы не подумала, что Свет внутри способен и на внешние изменения.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_701<tab>As our domains are shaped by our innermost desires, perhaps this is a reflection of the hope that had quickened in my heart.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_701<tab>Подобно тому, как наши аллоды являются отражением наших душ, то и тела в известной мере тоже? Это воплощение надежды, которая поселилась в моём сердце.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_702<tab>You came to the Thirteenth to rescue Azdaja and protect your world. Our meeting was happenstance, and our association one of mutual convenience.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_702<tab>Вы пришли на Тринадцатый ради спасения Аждайи и защиты собственного мира. Наша встреча была странным стечением обстоятельств... слишком странным для обычного совпадения.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_703<tab>Yet you and yours always treated me with kindness. As a friend. And through your friendship, I've found a new beginning.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_703<tab>Но ты и остальные отнеслись ко мне с добротой. Как к другу. И благодаря вашей поддержке я смогла начать новый путь.
TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_704<tab>Я навеки у всех вас в долгу.

source: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_705<tab>You may now enter the Lunar Subterrane with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
target: TEXT_AKTKML105_04748_SYSTEM_000_705<tab>Теперь вы сможете начать миссию «Лунные подземелья» с группой аватаров-NPC. Чтобы задействовать эту систему, используйте режим <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Напарники<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> доступ к которому можно получить из подменю <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Задачи<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> главного меню.
